about_the_game:
Tyler Clines Epic Music Pack arrives to RPG Maker with 10 songs that will surely help impact the most important moments in your latest creation. This music pack contains strong and powerful sounds with captivating melodies that are surely to enhance the impact of each scenario in which they are used in your game.

Tyler Clines Epic Music pack certainly lives up to its name, from creating an epic atmosphere surrounding villains or boss encounters, to arriving at new towns or impactful moments for your heroes. This is the pack you’ve been waiting for to add that little bit of extra “epic” to your grand adventure.


Features:

* 10 songs
* MP3, OGG, WAV and M4A formats included
* royalty-free music for your games

Tracklist:

1. Dark Sorcery
2. I Should Have Brought a Bigger Shield
3. Peaceful Tavern
4. Peaceful Forest
5. Dangerous Crowd
6 Lost Between Worlds
7. Moments Apart
8. New Heights
9. Birth of a Hero
10. Heroes and Villains

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* Not for use in games with gore
* Not for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Tyler Cline's Epic Music Pack" and "RPG Maker MV - Tyler Cline's Epic Music Pack" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!
